text: Solution: As it is selective repeat protocol, out of order frame receive hone pe receiver jo frame receive hui uska ACK send kar deta hai. since receiver is expecting 64, but it receives 65 and 66, so it store in to buffer and send ACK for that, and ack of 65 is received by sender but not for 64 and 66, so pending data packet is 64, and pending ACK is 64 and 66. In selective repeat individual ACK aate hai. Answer: C
